name.description: The upgrade's name as written on the card.

id.description: The upgrade's unique id number. It's not used in the game but it's used to link this upgrade to other data in this dataset.

slot.description: The slot used by this upgrade.

points.description: Squad points cost for this upgrade.

range.description: The upgrade's range. Usually attach related.

text.description: The upgrade's text as written on the card.

image.description: The file path for this upgrade's image.

xws.description: The upgrade's unique XWS id as described in the XWS format.

unique.description:
Some upgrade cards have unique names, which are identified by the bullet to the left of the name.
 A player cannot field two or more cards that share the same unique name, even if those cards are of different types.

size.description: This ship sizes this upgrade is restricted to.

items.description: A ship size the upgrade is restricted to.

effect.description:
Some upgrades have effects, like bomb tokens.
The text for such effects go here.

faction.description: The faction this upgrade is restricted to.

limited.description:
Indicates if this upgrade has the Limited trait.
A ship cannot equip more than one copy of the same card with the Limited trait.

squadLimited.description: Indicates if this upgrade is limited to a set number of times in a squad.

dualCard.description: Indicates if this upgrade is a dual card. If set, the number should be the other side's unique id.

ship.description: The ships this upgrade is restricted to.
